entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 5:21 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:21 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
